messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

On 10 February 2011 19:26,  <mathieu.lonjaret@gmail.com> wrote:
> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> fix example in inotify
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/4174045/
>
> Affected files:
>  M src/pkg/os/inotify/inotify_linux.go
>
>
> Index: src/pkg/os/inotify/inotify_linux.go
> ===================================================================
> --- a/src/pkg/os/inotify/inotify_linux.go
> +++ b/src/pkg/os/inotify/inotify_linux.go
> @@ -8,11 +8,11 @@
>  Example:
>     watcher, err := inotify.NewWatcher()
>     if err != nil {
> -        log.Exit(err)
> +        log.Fatal(err)
>     }
>     err = watcher.Watch("/tmp")
>     if err != nil {
> -        log.Exit(err)
> +        log.Fatal(err)
>     }
>     for {
>         select {
>
>
>

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=bc285bf0784d ***

fix example in inotify

R=golang-dev, adg
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/4174045

Committer: Andrew Gerrand <adg@golang.org>

subject: code review 4174045: fix example in inotify
